name: Ghoubbar Al Layl / the dregs of the day
name_original: Ghoubbar Al Layl / the dregs of the day
description:
Noor is trying to regain their sense of self, by completing quests to collect items for a sculptural self-portrait they work on in their Shame Room.

Meanwhile, they have to care for their ailing loved one, Luna, while their city is being destroyed by N.B.M.F (or "Nymph"), the National Bureau of Memory and Forgetting.

This game is still a prototype, but I hope you enjoy it anyway. Please pardon any glitches and play with sound ON!
